SELECT MF_SEQ, MF_CATEGORY, MF_TITLE, MF_REGDATE, MF_MEMO, MF_FILE_ID,MF_FILENAME, MF_NEWFILENAME,MF_USER_ID FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY MF_REGDATE DESC)AS RNUM, MF_SEQ, MF_CATEGORY, MF_TITLE, MF_REGDATE, MF_MEMO, MF_FILE_ID, MF_FILENAME, MF_NEWFILENAME,MF_USER_ID FROM MY_FILELOAD WHERE 1=1
AND MF_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
AND MF_MEMO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
AND MF_FILE_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
ORDER BY MF_REGDATE DESC) a WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ${start} AND ${end}

select ifnull(count(*), 0) from MY_FILELOAD
where title like concat('%', #{search}, '%') and del=0
where content like concat('%', #{search}, '%') and del=0
where id=#{search} and del=0
mapper.insert: insert into MY_FILELOAD(MF_CATEGORY, MF_TITLE, MF_MEMO, MF_FILE_Id, MF_FILENAME, MF_NEWFILENAME) values(#{mfCategory}, #{mfTitle}, #{mfMemo}, #{mfFileId},#{mfFilename},#{mfNFilename})
